incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 26/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of a TOR (Top of Rack) switch.

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the TOR(top of rack) Switch for a homogeneous infrastructure

Start time : 02/05/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 02/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of a TOR (Top of Rack) switch.
Start time : 02/05/2022 05:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 17:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to replace the pump 2 with an equivalent model.

Start time : 03/05/2022 05:00UTC End time : 03/05/2022 15:00UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We are going to update the automaton of the tank. Only one automaton will be made at a time.

Start time : 03/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 03/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Switching the ups to static bypass and battery discharge test Service improvement: The main objective of this maintenance is to perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS

Start time : 03/05/2022 19:00 UTC End time : 03/05/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We are currently using ACE and NSX for the connection to Hosted1 infra for HTTPS, POP3, IMAP4, etc... We want to use only NSX for that. We have to delete the IP of ACE . So after that change, Customer will connect to NSX only in order to have access to their emails. We are currently working with NSX AND ACE and all is working fine. The load on the CAS i very low because we have a lot of servers.
Start time : 03/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 01:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

Start time : 04/05/2022 00:30 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : vRack will be unreachable for 15 minutes Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the vRack switch.
Start time : 04/05/2022 03:30 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 05:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : This operation aims to homogenise our infrastructure to improve services

Start time : 04/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 04/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : switch to battery charging for 1 minute Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to test UPS batteries
Start time : 04/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 01:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

Start time : 05/05/2022 11:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : During this operation, there will be a reduction in the autonomy of the inverter Service improvement : As part of the preventive replacement of batteries that have reached the end of their useful life, we will be doing full battery replacements for the UPS 6A.

Start time : 05/05/2022 12:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : Some latency may be observed during the maintenance Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgarde the version of a network equipment.
Start time : 09/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 10/05/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5

Start time : 06/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 06/05/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of power to specific individual servers on the rack Service improvement: Replacement of all faulty C13/C14 cables in a bay
Start time : 08/05/2022 22:00 UTC End time : 09/05/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5

Start time : 09/05/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : During this operation, there will be a reduction in the autonomy of the inverter Service improvement : The purpose of this maintenance is to replace out-of-service or damaged batteries in a UPS

Summary : We are going to intervene in the rack to replace a large number of power supply cables that could have an insulation defect. Actions : Replacement of the C13/C14 power supply cables of the rack Start of intervention : 09/05/2022 09:00UTC Rack : R803L13 Impact : No impact expected as the rack will be empty before the operation Duration of intervention : 09H00
Start time : 10/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 11/05/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5

Start time : 18/05/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 18/05/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of power to E103A12 Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to replace a plastic water cooling clarinet by a copper one.
Start time : 25/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 25/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Start time : 30/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 30/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Start time : 02/05/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The new module will increase the cooling capacity of room G325
Start time : 20/06/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 20/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Following a constructor's guideline, we're doing a maintenance on a power delivery component in redundancy.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Start time : 28/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 29/04/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to perform some electrical work on UPS 14T1.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
